title: Liverpool transfer news: Jurgen Klopp urged not to sign Mario Gotze | Metro News
text:
Chris Davie for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 22 Feb 2017 10:03 am Mario Gotze is reportedly wanted by Liverpool this summer. (TF-Images/Getty Images) 
Jurgen Klopp should not make the signing of Mario Gotze a priority for Liverpool, according to former Chelsea and Celtic midfielder Craig Burley. 
Last week, reports claimed that Liverpool had opened talks over a £20 million deal for the Germany international. 
Gotze was a key part of Klopp’s Dortmund side as the pair won consecutive Bundesliga titles together in 2011 and 2012. 
‘This is a difficult one,’ Burley told ESPN. Gotze won two Bundesliga titles with Klopp at Dortmund. (Bongarts/Getty Images)
